name: Elementalist Survivor Sim 3D
description:
Elementalist is a warrior who may use spells in combat. Endless forest with many enemies such like Knights, Rangers, Ogres and Orcs. From wave to wave its getting harder to survive - gain, increase and use your experience to stand as long as possible !

Key features:
- female elementalist character
- 3d endless world
- great 3d graphics
- forest ambience
- lot of different enemies: knight, ranger, ogres, orcs
